results.definition: the period from 1920 to 1933 when the sale of alcoholic beverages was prohibited in the United States by a constitutional amendment
the action of prohibiting or inhibiting or forbidding (or an instance thereof)
examples: they were restrained by a prohibition in their charter

results.definition: a law forbidding the sale of alcoholic beverages
examples: in 1920 the 18th amendment to the Constitution established prohibition in the US

results.definition: refusal to approve or assent to
